          <title>
            <string language="en">Making a magnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden eines Magneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fabrication d'un aimant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo um ímã</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare un magnete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή ενός μαγνήτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación de un imán</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the process of making a magnet by stroking a piece of iron with a magnet for several times.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic strength</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetism</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Prozeß des Bildens 
eines Magneten, indem sie ein Stück Eisen mit einem Magneten während
mehrmals streicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le processus de faire un
aimant en frottant un morceau de fer avec un aimant pendant plusieurs 
fois.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o processo de fazer um 
ímã afagando uma parte de ferro com um ímã por diversas vezes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il processo di fare un
magnete segnando una parte di ferro con un magnete per parecchie 
volte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διαδικασία έναν 
μαγνήτη με να κτυπήσει ένα κομμάτι του σιδήρου με έναν μαγνήτη 
για αρκετές φορές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el proceso de hacer un 
imán frotando ligeramente un pedazo de hierro con un imán por varias
veces.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
